author: Susana Polo
title: On this Earth Day, we rank every alternate Earth in the DC multiverse
description: The DC Comics universe is actually a multiverse of 52 parallel worlds — each one influenced by the existence of Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, and the rest of the Justice League. But which one is the best?
content:
Here at Polygon, we refuse to be limited in our affections. While others celebrate Earth Day with praise for the singular Earth, we decided to sing the praises of 52 earths in total. Specifically, the 52 earths of the DC Comics multiverse. 
An interconnected… [+18041 chars]
